amendment.description: Amendment places restrictions on the use of certain FEMA funds provided to the Kaiser Permanente hospital in Panorama City, CA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any FEMA funding to permit the transfer of funding from the Kaiser Permanente hospital in Panorama City, California under the Seismic Hazard Mitigation Program for Hospitals or relocate the hospital to a site more than 3 miles from the current site.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berman amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
